channel.title: GeneriBot
channel.description:
I kinda finished my bot finally. For the moment I'm manually updating, and I can't figure out CFParse right now. Once I've figured that out, I'll post the required files. With its current configuration, it is controlled through IRC. To start the bot, type !loadrs <worldid>, then !loadscripts, then !loadrandoms. To start running a script or random, type !addlistener <scriptorrandomname>. To stop a script or random, type !remlistener <scriptorrandomname>. Eventually I'll get around to writing the methods, but for the moment, just be awed by its stylish hotness and try to learn how to script for it, because I'm not that good at it myself.
Now for the license: You modify it and post it, you die. You post it anywhere, you die. I'm not going to have any "iGeneriBots" or "GeneriBot Pros" going around.
EDIT: Taken down for the moment since newbiehacker is making it actually work.

item.title: GeneriBot
item.dc:creator: @sdouble sdouble
item.description:
@sdouble wrote:

Sounds exciting. I did a lot of scripting with aryan. I’d be happy to do some more when I have some free time.

Read full topic
